title: Capitalocene: how capitalism caused the climate crisis

media:group.media:title: Capitalocene: how capitalism caused the climate crisis
media:group.media:description:
Nope, it's not just "humanity"🤔

Mentioned videos:
🎬Anthropocene and the death of environmentalism: https://youtu.be/hKb3-mrVIk0
🎬Kurzgesagt and the art of climate greenwashing https://youtu.be/uCuy1DaQzWI

Sources and recommended reading (books are color-coded in terms of approachability):
Works by Jason W. Moore:
📗 A History of the World in Seven Cheap Things (with Raj Patel)
📜 Capitalocene I i II (the gist of the concept) https://jasonwmoore.com/academicpapers/
📙 Anthropocene or Capitalocene? Nature, History, and the Crisis of Capitalism (a collection of works by different authors)
📕 Capitalism in the Web of Life: Ecology and the Accumulation of Capital (it's not that difficult, just the most on this list)
🌐Numerous translations: https://binghamton.academia.edu/JasonWMoore/
Other:
📜The Ecomodernist Manifesto http://www.ecomodernism.org/
📗Jason Hickel, "Less is More: How Degrowth Will Save the World"
